summary: A letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to the Metropolitan Detention Center, providing the password for a CD containing discovery materials in the case against Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case (20 Cr. 330) for which discovery materials are being transmitted.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: The signatory of the letter, sending discovery materials related to the Maxwell case.

connections.description: Strauss, as Acting U.S. Attorney, is overseeing the prosecution of Maxwell.

events.title: Transmission of Discovery Materials
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office sends a password for a CD containing discovery materials to the detention center holding Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
Metropolitan Detention Center, 80 29th Street, Brooklyn, NY 11232
keyFacts: This document is official correspondence from the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330).
It confirms the transmission of discovery materials on a CD to the detention center where Maxwell was held.
Audrey Strauss was the Acting U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York at the time.
The document indicates ongoing legal proceedings in the Maxwell case as of October 2020.
